attributes.action: abolish peadophiles and child murderers having anonymity and a new identity, any physical or sexual harm to children must incur a lifelong prison sentence, they will never be reformed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Child batterers, molestors, predators and murderers are evil to the core, they will never be rehabilitated because theyr sickness is unnatural with no cure, these people should be kept away from our innocent children as they are extremely dangerous. we should also know who these people are, and their crimes as it is our children who should be protected not them.
